issue.title: Boolean's expression requirements are ordered inconsistently

discussion.p: For consistency of presentation, we should group and order the && and || expression requirements similarly to the == and != expression requirements. Note that the suggested change is not quite editorial: evaluation of requirements for satisfaction has short-circuiting behavior, so the declaration order of requirements is normatively significant in general.
discussion.note: 2019-06-13; Priority to 0 and Status to Tentatively Ready after seven positive votes on the reflector.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4810.
